      Returns:

      folderPath - The path to generate the PDF.

    • isValidZipFile

      boolean isValidZipFile(String submissionsZippedPath)
      Checks if a given zipped file is a valid ZIP file.
      Parameters:
      submissionsZippedPath - The path to the zipped submissions.
      Returns:
      True if the file is a valid ZIP file, false otherwise.
